details:
Liguidsoap is a GUI for controlling liquidsoap, using pyGTK.

 It allows one to interact in various ways with:
  * outputs
  * playlists
  * queues
  * mixing table

 It can control a running instance of liquidsoap or launch its own instance.
 role::program, scope::application, sound::compression, sound::mixer,
 sound::player, sound::recorder, sound::speech, uitoolkit::gtk,
 use::playing, use::transmission, works-with-format::mp3,
 works-with-format::oggvorbis, works-with-format::wav,
 works-with::audio, x11::application
